Title: Relates to restraint of individuals in facilities under the jurisdiction of the office of mental health
Summary: Relates to restraint of individuals in facilities under the jurisdiction of the office of mental health; establishes procedures which must be followed in order to restrain patients who are served in mental hygiene facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง33.04, add ยง33.10, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to restraint of individuals in facilities under the jurisdiction of the office of mental health
